historicalLandmarks.name: Red Fort
historicalLandmarks.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, this iconic fort showcases Mughal architecture and offers insights into India's history.

historicalLandmarks.name: Qutub Minar
historicalLandmarks.description: Standing at 73 meters, this minaret is adorned with intricate carvings and inscriptions.

historicalLandmarks.name: Humayun's Tomb
historicalLandmarks.description: An architectural precursor to the Taj Mahal, this tomb is set amidst lush gardens.

culturalExperiences.name: Swaminarayan Akshardham
culturalExperiences.description: This temple complex displays traditional Indian art, architecture, and spirituality.

culturalExperiences.name: India Gate
culturalExperiences.description: A war memorial honoring Indian soldiers, surrounded by expansive lawns ideal for evening strolls.

culturalExperiences.name: Lotus Temple
culturalExperiences.description: Known for its distinctive lotus-shaped design, this Bahá'í House of Worship welcomes visitors of all faiths.

bustlingMarkets.name: Chandni Chowk
bustlingMarkets.description: Experience the vibrant street food scene and shop for textiles, jewelry, and electronics in one of Delhi's oldest markets.

bustlingMarkets.name: Dilli Haat
bustlingMarkets.description: A cultural hub offering handicrafts, art, and cuisines from various Indian states.

bustlingMarkets.name: Sarojini Nagar Market
bustlingMarkets.description: Popular for affordable fashion & trendy clothes.

bustlingMarkets.name: Connaught Place
bustlingMarkets.description: A blend of modern shopping, cafes, and colonial architecture.

parksAndGardens.name: Lodhi Gardens
parksAndGardens.description: A city park spanning over 90 acres, housing the tombs of Sayyid ruler Mohammed Shah and Lodhi King Sikandar Lodhi.

parksAndGardens.name: Sunder Nursery
parksAndGardens.description: Adjacent to Humayun's Tomb, this heritage park features restored monuments, biodiversity zones, and water features.

museumsAndGalleries.name: National Museum
museumsAndGalleries.description: Explore artifacts spanning 5,000 years of Indian history, including sculptures, manuscripts, and decorative arts.

museumsAndGalleries.name: National Gallery of Modern Art
museumsAndGalleries.description: Showcasing contemporary Indian art, this gallery hosts works from renowned artists.

culinaryDelights.name: Paranthe Wali Gali
culinaryDelights.description: Located in Chandni Chowk, this lane is famous for its variety of stuffed parathas.

culinaryDelights.name: Karim's
culinaryDelights.description: Established in 1913 near Jama Masjid, it's renowned for Mughlai cuisine, especially kebabs and biryanis.

uniqueExperiences.name: Rickshaw Ride in Old Delhi
uniqueExperiences.description: Navigate the narrow lanes of Old Delhi on a rickshaw, immersing yourself in the area's rich history and bustling atmosphere.

uniqueExperiences.name: Lodhi Art District
uniqueExperiences.description: Explore India's first open-air public art district, featuring murals and street art by Indian and international artists.

places.name: Red Fort
places.description: A UNESCO Heritage Site with grand Mughal architecture.

places.name: Jama Masjid
places.description: One of the largest mosques in India.

places.name: Chandni Chowk
places.description: Famous for street food like parathas, kebabs, and jalebis.

places.name: Raj Ghat
places.description: Mahatma Gandhi’s memorial.

places.name: Humayun’s Tomb
places.description: A Mughal-era tomb and precursor to the Taj Mahal.

places.name: Karim’s
places.description: Iconic Mughlai restaurant near Jama Masjid.

places.name: India Gate
places.description: An illuminated war memorial.

places.name: Connaught Place
places.description: A hub for shopping, cafés, and nightlife.

places.name: Qutub Minar
places.description: Tallest brick minaret in the world.

places.name: Lotus Temple
places.description: A serene Bahá'í House of Worship.

places.name: ISKCON Temple
places.description: Spiritual chanting & Bhagavad Gita exhibitions.

places.name: Swaminarayan Akshardham
places.description: A grand temple complex with cultural exhibitions.

places.name: Dilli Haat
places.description: Market with handicrafts and food from Indian states.

places.name: Hauz Khas Village
places.description: Trendy cafes, art galleries, and scenic lake views.

places.name: Sarojini Nagar Market
places.description: Affordable fashion shopping.

places.name: Janpath & Tibetan Market
places.description: Handicrafts, jewelry, and souvenirs.

places.name: Lodhi Art District
places.description: India's first open-air street art gallery.

places.name: Café Lota
places.description: Traditional Indian food with a modern touch.

places.name: Kingdom of Dreams
places.description: Live Bollywood-style cultural performances.

places.name: Lodhi Gardens
places.description: Perfect for a morning walk.

places.name: Sunder Nursery
places.description: A heritage park with biodiversity.

places.name: National Museum
places.description: 5,000 years of Indian history.

places.name: Andhra Bhavan
places.description: Famous for South Indian thalis.

places.name: Waste to Wonder Park
places.description: Mini replicas of world monuments made from scrap.

places.name: Rooftop Dining
places.description: Dinner at Q’la or Dramz with a city view.

historicalLandmarks.name: Rani ki Vav
historicalLandmarks.description: A UNESCO-listed stepwell in Patan, renowned for its intricate carvings and architectural grandeur.

historicalLandmarks.name: Laxmi Vilas Palace
historicalLandmarks.description: An opulent 19th-century palace in Vadodara, four times the size of Buckingham Palace.

culturalExperiences.name: Sabarmati Ashram
culturalExperiences.description: The former residence of Mahatma Gandhi, offering insight into India's freedom movement.

culturalExperiences.name: Modhera Sun Temple
culturalExperiences.description: An 11th-century temple dedicated to the Sun God, showcasing magnificent architecture.

bustlingMarkets.name: Law Garden Night Market
bustlingMarkets.description: A vibrant market in Ahmedabad known for traditional Gujarati handicrafts and street food.

bustlingMarkets.name: Bhuj Haat
bustlingMarkets.description: A local market in Bhuj offering Kutchi embroidery, leather crafts, and silver jewelry.

parksAndGardens.name: Gir National Park
parksAndGardens.description: Home to the Asiatic lion, offering thrilling wildlife safaris.

parksAndGardens.name: Kevadia Jungle Safari
parksAndGardens.description: A scenic park near the Statue of Unity, home to diverse wildlife and adventure activities.

museumsAndGalleries.name: Kite Museum
museumsAndGalleries.description: A unique museum in Ahmedabad dedicated to the art of kite flying.

museumsAndGalleries.name: Maharaja Fateh Singh Museum
museumsAndGalleries.description: Showcasing European and Indian artworks from the royal collection of Vadodara.

culinaryDelights.name: Manek Chowk
culinaryDelights.description: A bustling night food market in Ahmedabad famous for street snacks like pav bhaji and dosa.

culinaryDelights.name: Sasuma Gujarati Thali
culinaryDelights.description: A renowned restaurant serving an authentic Gujarati thali experience.

uniqueExperiences.name: Statue of Unity
uniqueExperiences.description: The world's tallest statue, dedicated to Sardar Patel, offering panoramic views and exhibitions.

uniqueExperiences.name: Rann Utsav
uniqueExperiences.description: An annual festival celebrating the beauty of the White Rann with cultural performances and tent stays.

places.name: Somnath Temple
places.description: A sacred temple by the sea.

historicalLandmarks.name: Gateway of India
historicalLandmarks.description: An iconic arch monument built during the 20th century.

places.name: Gateway of India
places.description: A popular tourist attraction.
